sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Advanced MEMS sensors from STMicroelectronics power-up the Onlife era
feed.summary: STMicroelectronics has launched its third generation of advanced MEMS sensors, designed for consumer mobile, smart industries, healthcare, and retail applications. These new sensors offer enhanced accuracy and energy efficiency, along with features like machine learning core (MLC) and electrostatic sensing for improved performance in areas like activity detection, indoor navigation, and human-presence detection. Products like the LPS22DF/LPS28DFW barometric pressure sensors and LIS2DU12 3-axis accelerometer are already in production or scheduled for release, promising ultra-low power consumption and advanced capabilities.

feed.title: MGM Resorts International (MGM): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on MGM Resorts International (MGM), highlighting multiple near- and long-term catalysts for growth. Key drivers include aggressive share buybacks, BetMGM's profitability and cash distributions, the Northfield Park sale, stabilization of Las Vegas Strip operations, and the future Osaka integrated resort. The company is projected to trade at approximately 7x Owner Earnings and has a bullish target of up to $46 per share.

feed.title: 48 weeks on bezuclastinib cuts systemic mastocytosis symptoms 56%
feed.summary: Cogent Biosciences announced positive 48-week data from its SUMMIT trial for bezuclastinib in NonAdvanced systemic mastocytosis (NonAdvSM), showing a 56% improvement in Total Symptom Score and high rates of serum tryptase reduction and normalization. The results also indicated clinically meaningful improvements in bone mineral density, supporting bezuclastinib's potential as a disease-modifying agent. The company also reported inducement equity grants for new employees.

feed.title: Can MarketAxess (MKTX) Turn a New AI-Focused CTO Hire into Lasting Trading-Margin Advantages?
feed.summary: MarketAxess Holdings Inc. recently appointed William Quan as Chief Technology Officer, signaling a strategic push towards AI integration and modernization across its fixed-income trading platforms. His extensive experience in AI-driven trading is expected to strengthen MarketAxess' electronic credit expansion and efficiency, particularly through enhanced infrastructure and the DirectBooks integration. While Quan's hire is viewed as a positive directional step, the company still faces challenges like intensified competition and the need to re-accelerate electronic credit growth amidst potential cyber and regulatory risks.

feed.title: Howmet Aerospace Is Up 49% in the Last 6 Months. Here’s Where the Stock Could Head in 2026
feed.summary: Howmet Aerospace (HWM) stock has risen 49% in the last six months, driven by record earnings, increasing gas turbine demand, and expanding margins. The company's fourth-quarter results and positive 2026 guidance, including strong revenue and EPS growth, have reinforced investor confidence. Analysts project further upside, with a target price of $302, indicating the stock is moderately undervalued based on sustained aerospace production, elevated engine spares demand, and gas turbine growth.

feed.title: SmartSky files suit against Gogo, alleging patent infringement -
feed.summary: SmartSky Networks has filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Gogo Business Aviation, claiming that Gogo's forthcoming 5G onboard Internet service and related hardware infringe upon four of SmartSky's patents. SmartSky also seeks a preliminary injunction to stop Gogo's 5G rollout during the legal proceedings. Gogo denies the allegations, stating that a thorough review of SmartSky's patents was conducted and that they believe the claims are without merit, committing to an on-time 5G launch later this year.

feed.title: CIFRW Financials: Income Statement, Balance Sheet & Cash Flow
feed.summary: This article provides a detailed financial overview of Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFRW), including its income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement, and key financial ratios. Based on FY2024 annual data, the company demonstrates strong revenue growth but struggles with profitability, negative free cash flow, and low financial health scores. The analysis highlights an increase in revenue and EBITDA but also significant decreases in net income and free cash flow.

feed.title: Cboe Global Markets, Inc. (CBOE): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Cboe Global Markets, Inc. (CBOE) by Collin Cook, highlighting the company's strong 4Q25 performance with record net revenue driven by derivatives markets and options activity. The report notes CBOE's expanding operating margins, record adjusted EPS, and strategic operational streamlining, positioning it for durable growth amidst healthy client demand and innovation. The stock has appreciated significantly since a previous bullish coverage, with Cook emphasizing recent strong results and operating leverage.

feed.title: How Resy Helps American Express Grab the Check
feed.summary: American Express's acquisition of the restaurant reservation platform Resy three years ago has created a symbiotic marketing strategy centered on exclusivity. The partnership allows Amex premium cardholders to gain exclusive access to bookings at top restaurants globally through Resy's Global Dining Access program. This strategy not only enhances perks for cardholders but also reinforces the premium status of the American Express brand.

feed.title: The Journey from Patient to Scientist: A Q&A with Dr. Primal Kaur
feed.summary: Dr. Primal Kaur, a physician scientist and Vice President of Global Development, Inflammation at Amgen, discusses how her personal experience with severe asthma as a child inspired her career in medicine and her work on treatments for chronic inflammatory diseases. She highlights the development of TEZSPIRE (tezepelumab-ekko), a new medication for severe asthma, and emphasizes the fulfillment found in helping patients lead lives less defined by their illness. Dr. Kaur encourages perseverance to those pursuing careers in science and medicine, noting the significant impact they can make.
